data: Anyone who has read the Mort d’Arthur can hardly fail, if he traverse the Combe of Edge in early summer, to be struck by its resemblance to the fairy Valley of Avilion.
Mort d’Arthur | Combe of Edge | Valley of Avilion
Combe of Edge | Valley of Avilion
Anyone who has read the _Mort d'Arthur_ can hardly fail, if he traverse the Combe of Edge in early summer, to be struck by its resemblance to the fairy Valley of Avilion.
